title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning       Park planning directs park management activities in accordance with applicable laws and with full public involvement.  Open for Review  Current Park Projects - The NPS planning web site has a list of current and recent plans, projects, and actions open for public review. An archive of past projects is also available.  Major Park Plans  National Park Service. 1996. General Management Plan, Development Concept Plan and Environmental Impact Statement, Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park, Skagway, Alaska and Seattle, Washington. Anchorage, AK: National Park Service. Available online (PDF 15.1 MB)   Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park Foundation Statement, April 2009. Available for download (PDF 18.7 MB).    Planning Archive  Dyea Project Environmental Assessment. 2002. Download (PDF 71.4 KB)  State of the Park Economic Impact Study Klondike Gold Rush. 2003. Download (PDF 565 KB)  See Also  Klondike Gold Rush Administrative History. 1995.  Available online.
